Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework (GBF) bụ nsonaazụ nke ọgbakọ 2022 United Nations Biodiversity Conference
Aha echere ya abụrụla "Mkpụrụ n'ime ụdịdị dị iche iche zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Post-2020"
A nabatara GBF site na ọgbakọ nke iri na ise nke otu (COP15) na Nkwekọrịta banyere Diversity Biological na 19 Disemba 2022
A kwalitere ya dị ka "Agreement Paris for Nature".

Akpọrọ aha Framework ahụ aha obodo abụọ, Kunming, nke echere ka ọ bụrụ obodo nnabata maka COP15 na Ọktọba 2020 mana yigharịrị wee hapụ ọrụ nnabata n'ihi amụma COVID China, yana Montreal, nke bụ oche nke Mgbakọ na Diversity Diversity
Secretariat wee banye na nnabata COP15 ka Kunming kwụsịrị.
GBF nwere ebumnuche 4 zuru ụwa ọnụ ("Kunming-Montreal Global Goals for 2050") na ebumnuche 23 ("Kunming-Montreal 2030 Global Targets")
A na-akpọkarị "Target 3" dị ka ebumnuche "30 site na 30"
Ọ na-aga nke ọma atụmatụ Strategic for Biodiversity 2011-2020 (gụnyere ebumnuche Aichi Biodiversity Targets)
Ọ na-akọwapụta na mba ga-akwụsị inye aka n'ihe omume ndị na-emebi ọzara, dị ka ịkụpụta akụ na ụbara na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe.
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ anọ ahụ bụ:
